definition: Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])
suburbs or outskirts/one of the five degrees of official mourning attire in dynastic China/official in charge of fields (old)

sentences.english: Burmese language signs in the market are testament to the Burmese in the community.
sentences.chinese: 市場上的緬甸語招牌證明社區中有緬甸人。

definition: men and women should not touch hands when they give or receive things (citation, from Mencius)
pinyin: nan2 nu:3 shou4 shou4 bu4 qin1

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
